Module com.example.byebyeboxeyes
Package com.example.byebyeboxeyes.model

Class SessionsDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.byebyeboxeyes.model.SessionsDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISessionsDAO
public class SessionsDAO extends Object implements ISessionsDAO
An implementation of sessionsDAO. Creates a session table if one doesn't exist and contains methods with JDBC queries that perform CRUD operations on the table.
